sentence:
In this method,
the recursive cloning of DNA-barcoded modules via specific designated
restriction sites within the modules (between the construct and the
DNA barcode in each module) results in the accumulation of the DNA
constructs on one side and the DNA barcodes on the other side of the
restriction sites (Figure 1a).

In this method,
the recursive cloning of DNA-barcoded modules via specific designated
restriction sites within the modules (between the construct and the
DNA barcode in each module) results in the accumulation of the DNA
constructs on one side and the DNA barcodes on the other side of the
restriction sites (Figure 1a).
